hero.title: Private Events at Jackson House
paragraphs: At Jackson House, we believe gatherings should feel personal, memorable, and effortless. Whether you're celebrating a milestone, hosting colleagues, or planning an elevated evening, our spaces and hospitality team are here to make it special.

events.best_for: Birthdays, business dinners, and social gatherings that want a private touch within regular service hours.
location_capacity: Indoor Dining Room - up to 30 guests
highlights: Full access to our seasonal dining menus
notes: Pricing does not reflect tax + gratuity
For larger or customized experiences, see our Curated Events

events.best_for: Chef-driven, elevated formats designed for memorable evenings - from refined multi-course dinners to lively social experiences.
location_capacity: Indoor Dining Room - up to 30 guests
pricing: Plated + Coursed - $125-$175 per guest (refined multi-course seated dinner)
Social + Shareables - starting at $105 per guest (reception-style gathering featuring chef creations)
